Texts.Eng: I am detecting abnormalities in your brain that seem to be causing you to have issues in utilizing your full physical capacity. It should pass, eventually.
I suggest you put that knife down. You just cut your own arm open and appear to be bleeding profusely.
Well, it would appear that your current seat has randomly caught on fire. That or you set it on fire. Either way, it is on fire. And so are you.
Why have you decided to suddenly munch on some plant fibre? Don't try to deny it. My sensors indicate you have ingested it.
You have recovered some of your lost mental stability.
Your brain and body are currently in dispute over your hunger.
Your brain has stopped sending signals to your legs. It appears to be a synaptic issue, likely related to your bouts of insanity.
